data.name: CT0001_Title
data.value: Control flow statement without braces must contain only return, throw, continue, break, or yield break

data.name: CT0001_MessageFormat
data.value: Control flow statement without braces can only contain return, throw, continue, break, or yield break statements

data.name: CT0001_Description
data.value: Control flow statements without braces should only contain simple control flow statements to prevent bugs and improve readability.

data.name: CT0001_CodeFix_Title
data.value: Add braces

data.name: CT0002_Title
data.value: Enum properties should not be assigned literal values

data.name: CT0002_MessageFormat
data.value: Enum property '{0}' should not be assigned literal value '{1}'. Use the appropriate enum value instead

data.name: CT0002_Description
data.value: Enum properties should be assigned enum values rather than literal numeric values to improve code readability and maintainability.

data.name: CT0003_Title
data.value: Remove empty parentheses from object initialization

data.name: CT0003_MessageFormat
data.value: Object initialization should not use empty parentheses. Remove '()' from 'new {0}()' when using object initializer

data.name: CT0003_Description
data.value: Object initialization with empty parentheses followed by an initializer is unnecessary and should be avoided for cleaner code.

data.name: CT0004_Title
data.value: Control flow statement with braces containing only control flow should not have braces

data.name: CT0004_MessageFormat
data.value: Block containing only a control flow statement (return, throw, continue, break, or yield break) should not have braces

data.name: CT0004_Description
data.value: When a block contains only a single control flow statement, braces should be omitted to improve code readability and consistency.

data.name: CT0004_CodeFix_Title
data.value: Remove braces

data.name: CT0005_Title
data.value: Constructor has duplicate dependency injection parameter types

data.name: CT0005_MessageFormat
data.value: Constructor has multiple parameters of type '{0}': {1}

data.name: CT0005_Description
data.value: Having multiple constructor parameters of the same dependency injection type (Service, Repository, Handler, Provider, Factory, Manager, Client) can lead to confusion and accidental parameter swapping.

data.name: CT0006_Title
data.value: Plugin class missing XML documentation summary

data.name: CT0006_MessageFormat
data.value: Plugin class '{0}' should have a short XML documentation summary describing its purpose

data.name: CT0006_Description
data.value: Classes that inherit from Plugin should have a short XML summary comment explaining what the plugin does.

data.name: CT0007_Title
data.value: Use ContainsAttributes instead of Contains on Entity types

data.name: CT0007_MessageFormat
data.value: Use ContainsAttributes(x => x.{0}) instead of Contains("{0}") for type-safe attribute checking

data.name: CT0007_Description
data.value: Entity types should use the type-safe ContainsAttributes method with lambda expressions instead of the string-based Contains method to enable compile-time checking of attribute names.

data.name: CT0008_Title
data.value: AddFilteredAttributes not allowed on Create operations

data.name: CT0008_MessageFormat
data.value: AddFilteredAttributes cannot be used with Create operations because it has no effect

data.name: CT0008_Description
data.value: Create operations do not support filtered attributes. It has no effect on whether the step gets triggered

data.name: CT0009_Title
data.value: PreImage not allowed on Create operations

data.name: CT0009_MessageFormat
data.value: AddImage with {0} cannot be used with Create operations because no previous record state exists

data.name: CT0009_Description
data.value: Create operations cannot have pre-images because the record does not exist before the create operation. ImageType.Both is also invalid as it includes PreImage.

data.name: CT0010_Title
data.value: PostImage not allowed on Delete operations

data.name: CT0010_MessageFormat
data.value: AddImage with {0} cannot be used with Delete operations because no record state exists after deletion

data.name: CT0010_Description
data.value: Delete operations cannot have post-images because the record no longer exists after the delete operation. ImageType.Both is also invalid as it includes PostImage.

data.name: CT0011_Title
data.value: GetTarget result must be assigned to variable named 'target'

data.name: CT0011_MessageFormat
data.value: Variable '{0}' should be named 'target' when assigned from GetTarget<T>()

data.name: CT0011_Description
data.value: When calling context.GetTarget<T>(), the result should be assigned to a local variable named 'target' for consistency and readability.

data.name: CT0012_Title
data.value: GetTargetMergedWithPreImage result must be assigned to variable named 'merged'

data.name: CT0012_MessageFormat
data.value: Variable '{0}' should be named 'merged' when assigned from GetTargetMergedWithPreImage<T>()

data.name: CT0012_Description
data.value: When calling context.GetTargetMergedWithPreImage<T>(), the result should be assigned to a local variable named 'merged' for consistency and readability. Using 'target' is specifically prohibited to avoid confusion.
